FINDERS-KEEPERS     Technical Recruiting for Bay Area Companies - Direct Hire (FTE)     Specialty Technical Solution Providers Partnerships- Client Development and RecruitingSYSTEMS INTEGRATION SOLUTIONS (SIS)-       Part time Client Account Management and Recruiting

Secured and retained one of the most valued Fortune 500 clients.  Rebuilt client relationship, and  increased  market share.Handled a year long, in depth, RFI/RFP strategy and proposal planning effort, which solidified our commitment to this client, and aligned our strategy to match their changing business needs.Took the overall performance level from a service ranking of 20 out of 24, to being chosen as 1 of 4 firms to support this company nationwide.Developed new clients partnerships by leveraging my relationships in technical communities across the U.S.Spearheaded the development of an onshore junior recruiting program to support clients. This program was then rolled out company wide into a successful program called the Associate Technical Recruiter (ATR) Program.

New client development for both technical solution driven projects,  and technical consultant staffing and the Northern California region.Successfully added a collection of diverse new clients ranging from Gaming, Technology, Insurance, Finance, and Healthcare.

Hired for New Business Development in the Practice Areas of: Project Management, Quality Assurance, Software Development, and Engineering Services.Maintained and grew an existing National Client which was in my region, and brought in a diverse new portfolio of business focused primarily in the Financial, Technical and Healthcare verticals.

Brought in to Oversee and Develop one of Glotel's largest  National accounts, Charles Schwab.Main focus was to be client facing to rebuild relationships, and create revenue growth.Built and managed  a team of recruiting and administrative support.Started as an Account Executive and was promoted twice, the last position as Director of National Accounts.Added clients to our portfolio such as BEA, Juniper Networks and Wells Fargo.

Susan has assisted me for several years as a staffing partner.Working with her firm's resources, she has consistently and quickly provided qualified candidates to meet my staffing requirements.    Her deep experience in the technology staffing space lets her locate the specific skills that are needed by a manager or as the case may be, a larger organization.  In tight markets or soft, Susan always provided quick turnaround and exceptional client service in a polished manner.    As I moved into different hiring manager roles with different companies over the last several years, Susan has been a trusted partner who I can count on to help me find candidates with the right skills and build an effective team.  I look forward to working with Susan again for my future staffing needs.
